ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from accessing games they are not allowed to view by age.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Game__r.ESRB_Rating__c,"E10+ (Everyone 10+)") && Game_Account__r.Age__c < 10, true, false)
||
IF(ISPICKVAL(Game__r.ESRB_Rating__c,"T (Teen)") && Game_Account__r.Age__c < 13, true, false)
||
IF(ISPICKVAL(Game__r.ESRB_Rating__c,"M (Mature)") && Game_Account__r.Age__c < 16, true, false)
||
IF(ISPICKVAL(Game__r.ESRB_Rating__c,"AO (Adult Only)") && Game_Account__r.Age__c < 18, true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You're not old enough to purchase this game.
